long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Social Limit, a powerful tool designed to help users manage their time effectively while browsing social media and other distracting websites. This extension allows users to set time limits on specific websites, ensuring that their online activities remain balanced and productive.

Key Features:
1. Customizable Time Limits:
Users can set a specific time limit for each website they want to manage. Whether it's social media, news, or entertainment sites, you can decide how much time you're willing to spend on each.

2. Blocklist Management:
Easily add websites to your blocklist. Once added, these sites will be monitored, and usage time will be tracked automatically.

3.Real-Time Notifications:
When you navigate to a website on your blocklist, a notification will pop up, informing you that your usage time is being tracked. This instant alert helps you stay conscious of your browsing habits.

4. Countdown Timer:
A countdown timer will appear, showing the remaining time you have left on the website. This feature ensures you are always aware of how much time is left, helping you manage your activities effectively.

5.Automatic Redirection:
Once the set time limit is reached, the extension will automatically redirect you to a block page. This page can be customized with motivational messages or reminders about your goals, reinforcing positive behavior.

6. Cover active website to gray vibe
Converting web page background color to grayscale to limit user attention when using the website

How It Works:
Setup:
Install the Social Limit extension and access the settings panel. Here, you can add websites to your blocklist and set individual time limits for each site.

Usage:
As you browse, the extension works in the background, monitoring the time spent on blocklisted websites. Notifications and timers keep you informed and on track.

Enforcement:
When the allotted time is up, the extension takes over and redirects you away from the site, ensuring that you adhere to your set limits.
Social Limit is an essential tool for anyone looking to improve their time management and reduce distractions. By providing real-time feedback and enforcing time limits, this extension helps users stay focused and productive
